login.title: Welcome to Perrito Launcher
login.subtitle: To continue, you must sign in with an account
login.footer: Having an account is required to use the launcher

add-account.title: Add Perrito Studios account
add-account.description: Create a new offline account for Perrito Studios

microsoft.title: Signing in with Microsoft...
microsoft.subtitle: A window will open for sign in. Once you complete the process, this window will close automatically.

account.title: Select Account
account.subtitle: Choose the account you want to play with.

status.upToDate: You are running the latest version

allowPrerelease.title: Allow pre-release versions
allowPrerelease.description: Receive updates for beta and pre-release versions

autoCheck.title: Automatic checking
autoCheck.description: The launcher automatically checks for updates on startup

notification.title: New Update
notification.descriptionReady: The update has been downloaded successfully

account.title: Account
account.description: Add new accounts or manage existing ones

empty.title: No accounts available
empty.description: Add an account from the Accounts section in settings

autoconnect.title: Auto-connect to server
autoconnect.description: Automatically connect to the server when the game starts

sync-language.title: Sync language
sync-language.description: Use the same launcher language in the game

process-independent.title: Independent process
process-independent.description: Allow closing the launcher after starting the game

mods-required.title: Required mods
mods-required.description: These mods are required by the server and are always active

mods-optional.title: Optional mods
mods-optional.description: These mods can be enabled or disabled according to your preferences

mods-local.title: Local Mods (Drop-in)
mods-local.description: Manage your local mods by dragging .jar, .zip or .litemod files

empty.title: No mods installed
empty.description: Drag files here or use the buttons to manage your mods

installed.title: Drag more mods here to add them

memory.title: Memory
memory.info: Recommended minimum memory is {{recommended}} for optimal performance.

executable.title: Java Executable
executable.description: Select the Java version to use
executable.required: Java executable is validated before game launch. Java 21 x64 is required.
executable.info: The path must end with bin\javaw.exe

jvm.title: Additional JVM Options
jvm.description: Configure additional options for the JVM
jvm.info: Options that will be provided to the JVM at runtime. -Xms and -Xmx should not be included.

language.title: Launcher Language
language.description: You can change the language in the list below. Changes will be applied immediately.

prerelease.title: Allow Pre-Release Updates
prerelease.description: Pre-releases include new features that may not have been fully tested or integrated. This will always be true if you are using a pre-release version.
prerelease.label: Allow Pre-Releases

data_directory.title: Data Directory
data_directory.description: Location where all launcher data is stored, including games, configurations and mods.
data_directory.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Changing the data directory will move all existing files to the new location. This process may take several minutes depending on the size of the data.

about.title: About
about.description: Information about the launcher and latest updates

info.title: Perrito Studios Launcher
info.description: Official launcher for Perrito Studios servers

empty.message: No releases have been published yet
empty.info: This launcher is currently in development. Release notes will be available once the first official version is published.

status.not-found: Release notes not found for the current version

updates.title: Launcher Status
updates.description: Information about current version and updates
updates.latest: You are using the latest version

server.title: Select Server
server.description: Choose the server you want to play on
